docs.title: 解决Clash-for-windows-bin不能开启TUN模式
docs.text:
Bash
yay -S clash-for-windows-bin
rm -rf /home/$USER/.config/clash
rm -rf /home/$USER/.config/clash_win
sudo rm -rf /opt/clash-for-windows-bin/resources
sudo rm -rf /opt/clash-for-windows-bin/locales
sudo mv ~/cfw/resources/ /opt/clash-for-windows-bin/
sudo mv ~/cfw/locales/ /opt/clash-for-windows-bin
sudo rm -rf /home/$USER/cfw

docs.title: 安装软件
docs.text:
Bash
yay -S visual-studio-code-bin
yay -S linuxqq libappindicator-gtk3 # libappindicator-gtk3允许QQ使用GTK3样式
yay -S flameshot
yay -S yesplaymusic
yay -S pandoc-bin
yay -S ttf-jetbrains-mono # 安装Jetbrain的编程字体

sudo pacman -S typora

docs.title: 安装拓展
docs.text:
• compiz-alike-magic-lamp-effect
  • AppIndicator-and-KStatusNotifierItem-Support
  • Blur-My-Shell
  • GTK-Title-Bar
  • Dash to Dock
  • Bluetooth Quick Connect
  • Transparent Window Moving
  • Desktop Icons NG (DING)
  • Window Is Ready - Notification Remover
  • Lock-keys

docs.title: grub默认启动系统
docs.text:
Bash
sudo vim /etc/default/grub
Text Only
#GURB_DEFAULT=0
GRUB_DEFAULT=saved
GRUB_SAVEDEFAULT=true
Bash
sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg

docs.title: 解决无法调用输入法
docs.text:
Bash
export LC_ALL=zh_CN.UTF-8
export GTK_IM_MODULE=fcitx
export QT_IM_MODULE=fcitx
export XMODIFIERS=@im=fcitx

docs.title: Git设置代理
docs.text:
Bash
git config --global https.proxy http://127.0.0.1:7890
git config --global https.proxy https://127.0.0.1:7890

docs.title: Git取消代理
docs.text:
Bash
git config --global --unset http.proxy
git config --global --unset https.proxy

docs.title: pip换源
docs.text:
Bash
cd ~
mkdir .pip/
cd .pip
vim pip.conf
Bash
[global]
index-url = https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple
[install]
use-mirrors =true
mirrors = https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple/
trusted-host = pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn

docs.title: Conda 换源
docs.text:
Bash
cd ～
vim .condarc
Bash
channels:
  - defaults
show_channel_urls: true
default_channels:
  - https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/main
  - https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/r
  - https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/msys2
custom_channels:
  conda-forge: https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud
  msys2: https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud
  bioconda: https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud
  menpo: https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud
  pytorch: https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud
  simpleitk: https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud
auto_activate_base: false
Bash
conda clean -i
